::KitKat:;

She pulled back and looked at Drillbit.  She wiped her face dry nad 
smiled slightly. "Yeah, I guess I did what I had to do.  But it 
hurts.  I never knew the right thing could hurt this much."

She sat up and looked around the room.  "I have to get back to my 
station." She hugged Drillbit, "Thank you." 

She stood up and took DrillBit's hand. "Will you jon me?"
